trans-unit.source: Represents an x- and y-coordinate pair in two-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: 表示二维空间中的 x 坐标和 y 坐标对。

trans-unit.source: In XAML, the delimiter between the <xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> values of a Point can be either a comma or a space.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，之间的分隔符<xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A>点的值可以是逗号或空格。</xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character.
trans-unit.target: 某些区域性可能会使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符而不是句点字符。

trans-unit.source: XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter.
trans-unit.target: XAML 处理固定区域性为 EN-US 在大多数 XAML 处理器实现中，默认设置，并且需要要将小数分隔符的段。

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a Point in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a Point attribute value into the <xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> components.
trans-unit.target: 应避免使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符如果在 XAML 中，指定点，将能与一个点属性值的字符串类型转换冲突因为<xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A>组件。</xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` -or- ``` ## XAML Values *x* The x-coordinate of this Point.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` -or- ``` # # XAML 值*x*此点的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: *y* The y-coordinate of this Point.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structure that contains the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>结构，其中包含指定的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 新的 x 坐标<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 新的 y 坐标<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>到<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>并返回结果作为<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Point> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Point> structure is prohibited.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structure to add.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> structure to add.
Returns the sum of point and vector.
Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> and whether it contains the same coordinates as this <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref:System.Object>是<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>以及它是否包含与此相同的坐标<xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Point> coordinates are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Point> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>可能会丢失精度运算时，比较两个<xref:System.Windows.Point>逻辑上相等的值可能会失败。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Double>

if o is a and contains the same and values as this ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if o is a and contains the same <>*> and <>*> values as this ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>是否相等的结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Point> coordinates are expressed using <xref:System.Double> values.
Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when operated on, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Point> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>可能会丢失精度上比较两个运行时<xref:System.Windows.Point>逻辑上相等的值可能会失败。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The point to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与此实例进行比较的点。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果这两个<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>结构都包含相同<> *1> 和<> *1> 值; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>是否相等的结构。

trans-unit.source: Point coordinates are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Point> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>可能会丢失精度运算时，比较两个<xref:System.Windows.Point>逻辑上相等的值可能会失败。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The first point to compare.
The second point to compare.
if point1 and point2 contain the same and values; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if point1 and point2 contain the same <>*> and <>*> values; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>.
The hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structure.
Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structure by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>由指定的结构<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: The point to transform.
The transformation matrix.
The transformed point.
Offsets a point's <xref:System.Windows.Point.X*> and <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y*> coordinates by the specified amounts.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量的点<> *1> 和<> *1> 坐标指定的量。

trans-unit.source: This operation is equivalent to adding a <xref:System.Windows.Point> to a <xref:System.Windows.Vector>.
Note that calling the Offset method will only have an effect if you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，调用偏移量方法将仅拥有一种效果如果可以更改<xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Point> is a value type, if you reference a <xref:System.Windows.Point> object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Point>是值类型，如果引用<xref:System.Windows.Point>对象使用的属性或索引，你将获得一份对象，未对对象的引用。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Point>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change <xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试更改<xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A>上的属性或索引器的引用，则编译器将发生错误。</xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, calling Offset on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object.
trans-unit.target: 同样，在属性或索引器调用偏移量不会更改基础对象。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Point> that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Point>, modify its fields, and then assign the <xref:System.Windows.Point> back to the property or indexer.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Point>引用为属性或索引器，创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Point>修改其字段，然后将分配<xref:System.Windows.Point>回属性或索引器。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Point>

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset the point's <xref:System.Windows.Point.X*> coordinate.
The amount to offset the point's <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y*> coordinate.
Translates the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 将指定<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>由指定<xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>并返回结果。

The amount by which to translate `point`.

trans-unit.source: A point's coordinates are described using <xref:System.Double> values.

Because the value of <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Point> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>在它们，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Windows.Point>逻辑上相等的值可能会失败。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Double>

The second <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structure to compare.

trans-unit.source: A point's <xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> coordinates are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when operated on, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Point> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Double>值可能会丢失精度上比较两个运行时<xref:System.Windows.Point>逻辑上相等的值可能会失败。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Double>
